DOC.brief_summary: Specific Aim : To improve childhood immunization rate utilize automated Electronic Health Record-derived provider-specific performance feedback report , couple automate Electronic Health Record-derived trigger alert . Hypothesis : The automated Electronic Health Record-derived provider-specific performance feedback report result 50 % decrease unimmunized child age 0-13 year age , couple automate Electronic Health Record-derived trigger alert , compare trigger alert alone .
DOC.criteria: pediatric resident provider Harriet Lane Clinic Johns Hopkins University
